sentences.en: A quarrel often rises from a misapprehension.
I think we should clear up this misapprehension.
sentences.cn: 我想我们应该消除这一误会。

sentences.en: I think you want to see me but I am clearly under a complete misapprehension.
sentences.cn: 我以为你想见我,显然完全是我误解了.

sentences.en: I think, Miss Marple , that you are under a slight misapprehension, began Mr. Petherick.
sentences.cn: “我觉得, 马普尔小姐, 你有些误会了.”彭斯瑞克先生说.

sentences.en: I thought you wanted to see me but I was clearly under a complete misapprehension.
sentences.cn: 我以为你想见我,显然完全是我误解了.

sentences.en: I was under the misapprehension that he was dead.
I was under the misapprehension that the course was for complete beginners.
sentences.cn: 我误以为这门课是给纯粹的初学者开的。

sentences.en: Non - disease exists when a patient is under the misapprehension that disease is present.
sentences.cn: 非 疾之病之存在,乃是病人误认它的存在.

sentences.en: She could not attribute such behaviour to mistake or misapprehension of any kind.
sentences.cn: 她也不能把这种行为归之任何的误会或误解.

sentences.en: Some people are under the misapprehension that all politicians stink.
sentences.cn: 有些人误会所有的政客都可疑.

sentences.en: The boss's misapprehension mad her want to weep with frustration.
sentences.cn: 上司的误解使得她沮丧地想哭.

sentences.en: The earth was dark through misapprehension of God.
sentences.cn: 世人既误解了上帝,大地就黑暗了.

sentences.en: The fighting between the two sides rose from misapprehension.
sentences.cn: 双方之间的战争起因于误会.

sentences.en: To expose this misapprehension, would be to repeat what has been said in the introductory chapter.
sentences.cn: 要揭穿这一误解, 就得重复一下绪论中说过的话.

sentences.en: We were by now under no misapprehension about the extent of the problem.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，我们对问题的严重程度的理解并无偏差。

sentences.en: Would you please tell me that all of this is my misapprehension ( misunderstanding )?
sentences.cn: 9月3日11:45告诉我.这一切都是我的误解,好 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a mistaken belief or a wrong understanding of something
